title: The Sharpe Chronicles: Alexander's Genesis
description: Alex has a problem, his family is insisting that he come home for Christmas, but he's been keeping a big secret since going away to college. It'll be an interesting holiday dealing with nosy family, blood lust, picking out presents, and an evil vampire nemesis that wants to take over the world. Can he keep his family in the dark? Can he keep the peace and stop a vampire war? Can he find the perfect present for his baby sister?
author: Sam Bennett-Williams
